I know some people are interested in the indirect encoding-related 
paper, =
"Patterns Without Development," that I recently mentioned to 
the group.  H=
owever, understandably a lot of people would prefer not 
to wade through it=
s 40 pages to get the main ideas.  

So I am happy to announce that I just =
put up an 8-page condensed 
version (to be presented at the AAAI Sympoisum =
on Developmental 
Systems this fall):

http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/index.php?
o=
ption=3Dcom_content&task=3Dview&id=3D14&Itemid=3D28#stanley.aaaifs06

I kno=
w yahoo is going to break that link, so to get it you can also go 
to:

htt=
p://eplex.cs.ucf.edu

and click on "Publications."  The shorter version is =

called, "Exploiting Regularity Without Development." 

ken
